title: Should I Quit?
body: I may have only started this year and trust me I've enjoyed every tear my enemy has shed when I beat their carrying Quinn with my lamp, but the toxicity is too much to handle. Every time I get in a game someone does some normal BM by just popping a "?" or "Ez" which is fine, but when I kill them I usually do it back but most of the time they will respond with some pretty hating stuff like, "Lol stfu you're FLIPPING bad at the game lol you just want an excuse to not go to school because you'reifikaf0awfoaw0fpikaw-0pfik." Although Riot will not ban this sort of behavior as it does not contain some hatespeech or vulgarity because idk. I'm not sure if I can report someone for partial harassment through a ticket without it being discarded, if I can, then I'll be doing that.

replies.body:
LOL is a hard game, and it takes a long time just to learn it, let alone be good.
Now 2 years of playing and of new understanding on game culture, I think people a little soft.
You should know that after time and time again the game and most people are pretty cool.
GL noob.

First of all, Riot does punish that kind of behavior as it counts as a form of "persistent negativity". It does take a while longer to detect since you get a few free passes for being a bit of a bad mouth since everyone has a bad game here and there and that is understood. Its also harder to pick up on since it can be said many different ways, but if a player is consistently BMing and creating a negative environment for their team, it will eventually result in a punishment. 

Best thing you can do in this situation is to mute the enemy team and their emotes, and don't taunt them the the "?". Be the bigger player. 

Find a community and get involved definitely helps with avoiding the tilting. There are quite a few to check out, I recommend [Sumsoc](https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/?fref=nf).

If you're on the forums tilted and asking if you should quit, sounds like you don't enjoy enough to play. There are obviously kids on this game who tilt when you flash mastery or point out you outplayed them. Mute if it bothers you, and def report.
G leave the game save yourself before you get addicted like i am and literally yell when reading patch notes cause riot cant nerf / fix simple shit
As a mid silver player, I don't think you really know best on what "simple shit" needs to be "fixed" tbh
it is simple that even a silver player like me knows wtf to do

If you knew what to do, you probably wouldn't be in silver. I'm in gold and I still don't know what i'm doing. But I know it's ME that is the problem, not Riot, as PLENTY of people are higher than me and have fewer complaints about things that silver players consider broken.

bugs before content, stability before enhancements. As a player of any level these are what's meant generally as simple shit. And, as a player of any level, you'd be aware of Mordekaiser, who gets nerfed and buffed around bugs they don't bother fixing, so unless you encounter these bugs they're nerfing for, you're just weaker.

Will the Magi Egg man ever return …. wow


add me egg man nnnnnnnnnnnnnnn mfhkkfyfkykyj,

Where ever you go, people will taunt you, will BM, and they will show their dominance. You're not the only one who has to suffer through this, some people learn to defend themselves, others learn to let it go.

Yes. Riot have no interest in fixing issues with the game/platform/champions.

Get out while you still can.
Don't bother with riot support, they're useless. Game is trash now anyway, might as well quit and play something worth your time. If you really do want to keep playing then use the mute button.
